Package com.luna.common.i18n

Internationalization package.

See: Description

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Country
    Country.java
    CountryCode
    ISO 3166-1 country code.
    CountryCode.Assignment
    Code assignment state in ISO 3166-1.
    CurrencyCode
    Currency code (ISO 4217).
    LanguageAlpha3Code
    ISO 639-2 language code (3-letter lowercase code).
    LanguageAlpha3Code.Usage
    The usage of this language code.
    LanguageCode
    ISO 639-1 language code.
    LocaleCode
    Locale code.
    ScriptCode
    ISO 15924 script code.

Package com.luna.common.i18n Description

Internationalization package.

Source code is hosted at GitHub.

For Maven: 

 <dependency>
     <groupId>com.neovisionaries</groupId>
     <artifactId>nv-i18n</artifactId>
     <version>1.28</version>
 </dependency>
Version:
1.28
Author:
Takahiko Kawasaki
